title: Have Lizard, Will Travel
description: A lizard of many faces, he not only must save the world, but also convince a lady to pet his reptile.International agent Simon is on a mission. And it isn't to avoid the shoe of the woman he's sent to spy on.This undercover operative must find a dangerous recipe book before it's too late. The fate of shifterkind depends on him.But if it comes down to saving the lovely Petunia or the worldâ€¦his trouser-lizard wants a say.
author: Eve Langlais
